files.description: Defines run and test targets that always create /outputs/run.log and /outputs/test.log by executing the project run and test commands while teeing all output into the required log files each cycle.
Documents the evaluation cycle procedure and explicitly marks outputs/run.log and outputs/test.log as mandatory artifacts required on every cycle.

missionDescription: Add a Makefile (or equivalent) target (e.g., make run && make test) that writes /outputs/run.log and /outputs/test.log on every cycle; update /outputs/eval_loop.md to require these logs as mandatory cycle artifacts.
missionSuccessCriteria: Complete strategic task identified by Meta-Coordinator or escalated by Strategic Tracker

Curated insight (actionability 8-9/10): Executing tests and scripts and writing logs to /outputs provides the missing execution evidence and enables the evaluation loop to measure progress objectively (what ran, when, with what results). Th...
